title: Teen girl shot, found lying on apartment floor
content:
KALAMAZOO TOWNSHIP, MI-- Police are searching for the person who shot a teenage girl and left her lying on the floor of a Country Meadows apartment.
At approximately 1:41 a.m. July 20 Kalamazoo Township Police were called to the 2100 Block of Sunnyside Drive, Country Meadows Apartments, on a report of a shooting, according to a news release from the department.
Officers found a girl lying on the floor with an apparent gunshot wound and administered aid until an ambulance arrived and transported her to a local hospital.
The suspect in this incident fled the scene prior to officer's arrival. Authorities did not identify the person they consider the suspect or the relationship with the victim.
The Kalamazoo Township Police Department was assisted by the Michigan State Police and the Kalamazoo Department of Public Safety.
Authorities ask that anyone with information in this shooting to contact the Kalamazoo Township Police Department at 269-343-0568 or Silent Observer at 269-343-2100.
Authorities said the girl is in critical condition Wednesday morning.
Rosemary Parker is a reporter for MLive. Contact her at rparker3@mlive.com.
